data.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
data.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)

relatedRecords.name: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference
relatedRecords.description: Mid-Atlantic Developer Conference is a polyglot event, designed to bring together programmers from the region, regardless of their choice of platform, for two full days of learning from each other and building a stronger regional community.
